HOW TO PLAY

  • Click to begin.
  • Use the keys on your keyboard.

The ball will bounce in different directions based on where it hits the paddle. You are in control of the sliding paddle that can bounce the ball into the bricks above.

You can use angles and rebounds to control the direction the ball moves and smash the bricks. You have 3 lives. If the ball falls into the abyss below, you'll lose a life.

You can also use the SPACEBAR to pause/continue the game anytime.
